CheckTitle: Ensure alert is configured for single-factor console logins
Description: Ensures that an alert is configured in SLS to monitor and notify on console logins without MFA.
Risk: Single-factor authentication is vulnerable to credential compromise. MFA provides an additional security layer.

Recommendation.Text: Create and enable an alert in SLS to monitor single-factor console logins from ActionTrail logs.

Notes: This check looks for enabled alerts that monitor single-factor console logins.
